name: BeanstackTracker
0:
”Alexa, open Beanstack Tracker”
”Alexa, launch Beanstack Tracker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beanstack tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You must have a parent Beanstack account at a valid Library or School to use this skill. To find out if your Library or School uses Beanstack visit our website.

Beanstack Tracker on Alexa is the easiest way to log reading for your Beanstack account! Finishing a title and logging is easy, just say 'Alexa, Open Beanstack Tracker'.

Features:

• Have your parents connect their Beanstack account to Alexa for easy logging
• Quickly log finished titles by voice
• Log for One Reader or All Readers in an account at the same time
• Log books you’ve read before, or new books
